    Success Stories
    Real impact across industries

    Turn AI ambition into production-grade outcomes

    We help leaders cut through the vendor/LLM noise, choose what actually matters, and implement systems that intelligently create real business lift.

    Trusted by Tech Enterprises

    AI is everywhere, but enterprise value isn't there yet.

    Boards are pushing for AI, but credible roadmaps with outcomes are still hard.

    The Challenge

    AI pilots seldom scale, impact remains fragmented, and outcomes lack governance.

    Too much noise, too little signal.

    A flood of vendors and tools makes it hard to choose the right contextual path.

    Blockers to real adoption

    Messy data, workflow friction, unclear decision rights, and human-only processes block real adoption.

    Our Approach

    Our Solution

    At TYN, we convert business priorities into actionable AI transformation programs.

    Identify high-impact AI use cases

    Discover opportunities that truly move the needle for your business.

    Prioritize by ROI vs cost-to-realize

    Focus resources on initiatives with the best return potential.

    Choose build-vs-buy routes

    Optimal path selection for each use case in your portfolio.

    Redesign workflows to embed AI

    Transform processes for seamless AI adoption across the enterprise.

    Track outcomes end-to-end

    Measure and prove value from pilot to production at scale.

    Our Capabilities

    What powers our delivery

    01

    Deep Talent

    (strategy + execution)

    • Domain experts (Industry veterans): translate business context into the right use cases, constraints, and adoption path

    • Innovation consultants (PhDs & MBAs): intent → use cases → ROI narrative → stakeholder alignment

    • AI specialists (Masters): model strategy, architecture, evaluation, and responsible deployment

    • Delivery engineers: data engineering + app engineering + DevOps for production-grade rollout

    02

    Strong Ecosystem

    (best-fit solutions, faster)

    • Google Cloud (Gemini/Vertex) partnership: enterprise-grade AI foundation (certified associates)

    • Kissflow partnership: workflow automation to operationalize AI end-to-end

    • 1000+ startup access: rapid 'buy' scouting for niche and global innovations (across Israel, US, Swiss, UK & India)

    • yZone: TYN Innovation Labs across 3 academia institutions to solve industry problems at scale

    Partners

    Google CloudGeminiKissflowyZone
    03

    NIFO – TYN's Proprietary Toolkit

    (embedded accelerators)

    • TYN innovation portfolio map (what type of innovation to pursue)

    • TYN prioritization map (ROI vs Total Cost-to-Realize/readiness)

    • Built-in assets: solution showcase, reusable components/patterns, startup scouting workflow

    • ROI models + business case templates and value tracking dashboards

    • Program management: governance cadence, stage-gates, pilot-to-scale playbooks

    50+ experts across strategy, AI, and delivery
    NIFO Snapshot

    Our proprietary operating system for 'AI that actually ships'

    Frameworks + Playbooks + Tooling that remove friction across:

    Prioritization & ROI modeling
    Build-vs-Buy decisioning
    Workflow redesign & adoption
    Governance & guardrails
    Pilot-to-scale playbooks
    Program & rollout - end-to-end cadence & orchestration

    Why CXOs care:

    NIFO bridges strategy ↔ engineering ↔ operations, so programs don't stall after PoCs.
